2.0.name: wordpress/lowermedia-wp-social
2.0.description:
Social Media Toolbar Made Easy!!

This plugin creates a widget area and a widget that contains contains links to various sites where you can easily enter your profile URL. A user can enter their social media profile URL's into the widget and have a link to them displayed with the sites favicon. A user can also specify a top and left margin. The social media bar is then added to the begining of the body tag and can be positioned to the left or top of the browser.
